name: BOOP (Puddly_games)
description:
Beat On Other Players! 

A simple proof of concept for a platform fighter with twin-stick shooter elements. Local multiplayer 2 to 4 players or play against the computer. 6 unique characters. 

Controller required.

Controls:

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Aim

R - Special 1

L - Special 2

A - Jump

X - Melee

B - Grab

Credits:

Music - Juhani Junkala
